kjv_def: become dead, (cause to be) put to death, kill, mortify
derivation: from G2288 (θανατόω) to kill (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. to put to death
  2. metaph.
    1. to make to die i.e. destroy, render extinct
    2. by death to be liberated from the bond of anything, literally to be made dead in relation to (something)
